text:
It's with a heavy heart that we share the news that development on Emeris is on hold. We appreciate your support for all our efforts over the last few months and hope that your cross-chain adventure continues from here.

https://t.co/MlmCUJhTUX https://t.co/JatzGBHE6z

You can now earn #Staking rewards on 28 different tokens on Emeris! 

Simply stake from your portfolio page by selecting the asset of your choice. Find out the benefits of staking and why you may choose to stake with Emeris here: 
https://t.co/LqMUGDrWRC

text:
Great news for Emeris users! Now you can stake a wide variety of tokens using the Emeris interface. 
Staking your tokens helps secure the network and provides you with rewards at the same time. 

Explore now üëâ https://t.co/N6zTB3VoCH

#Staking #Earn https://t.co/6qNyojWQTL

The Gravity DEX protocol is moving to a separate chain @CrescentHub üåô to provide enhanced cross-chain #DeFi opportunities. 
Find out what this transition means to you as an Emeris user and the steps you should take if you've been providing liquidity. üëá

https://t.co/CMXYEqTlQi https://t.co/rXnkzPT07z

üîä Chain Integration Announcement

Emeris Beta has integrated 2 new chains, Comdex $CMDX & Sifchain $ROWAN. Now you can transfer & view your token balances all from inside the Emeris interface, with more functionalities, like swapping, to be added soon!
üëâ https://t.co/sozJOsHIVn https://t.co/UP9xBYS4sG

üîä Chain Integration Announcement 

Emeris Beta has integrated 7 new chains! Now you can transfer & view your token balances all from inside the Emeris interface, with more functionalities, like swapping, to be added soon! 
Welcome to Emeris üëâ 
https://t.co/aS21vVl4VP https://t.co/x5qongoQFy

üîä Coming soon to Emeris: Browser extension

Users will be able to:
üëâ access Emeris through Emeris new browser extension wallet
üëâ continue using existing solutions like @keplrwallet and other new wallets which will be added in the future

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/2e877hOA55

üîä Coming soon to Emeris: Airdrops Tracker

Users will be able to:
üëâ view all their airdrops on compatible chains in a comprehensive way
üëâ check their eligibility to past and upcoming airdrops across many chains 
üëâ claim airdrops directly from Emeris

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/RXd0xFgbUJ

üîä Coming soon to Emeris: Cross-chain DEX aggregation

Users will be able to:
üëâ access other DEXs like @osmosiszone, @sifchain, @junoswapdex, and more
üëâ view and select the best quote for any swap

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/cEF5Y4CG5K

üîä Coming soon to Emeris: Staking feature 

Users will be able to:
üëâ V1: stake assets on all supported chains
üëâ V2: auto-compound staking rewards on compatible chains

#Emeris2022 https://t.co/LblFAJ7cFK

üîä Emeris ‚Äî  Public Launch in Spring 2022 üéâ
